title: Person of Interest - Fight is here, so am I (05x01)
author: POI - Best Of
comment:
Fusco has unique nicknames for the main characters 
Reese - “Wonderboy”
Root- “ Coco Puffs” 
Finch -“Glasses”
As much as I loved Root and Shaw team-ups or Reece and Shaw team-ups, I actually liked Root and Reece a little more. We got to see these two grow as partners possibly even friends.

I love the mutual respect between these two.
This series has amazing writing,  when I saw this series for the first time I was so impressed, never thought Root become a hero and protector of Harold.
Miss this show, still waiting for the Shaw & Bear spin off series..
This show was full of charismatic characters
description:
- Extract from season 5 episode 1
